response.original_title: The Beatles’ “Please Please Me” in DTS-HD MA
response.overview: Experience the raw energy of The Beatles’ debut album, “Please Please Me,” with the unparalleled clarity of DTS-HD Master Audio 5.1 Surround mix on Blu-ray. Released in 1963, this album captures the youthful exuberance and groundbreaking sound that launched Beatlemania. Featuring iconic tracks like “I Saw Her Standing There,” “Love Me Do,” and the title track “Please Please Me,” this album showcases the band’s early rock and roll roots and infectious melodies.  With DTS-HD MA Surround, every song is delivered with stunning precision, enveloping you in a rich, multi-dimensional audio experience. The high-definition audio format preserves the intricate arrangements and pioneering recording techniques, offering an immersive listening experience for audiophiles and Beatles fans alike.  A Historic Debut! Rediscover “Please Please Me” and immerse yourself in the album that started it all on Blu-ray.
response.title: The Beatles’ “Please Please Me” in DTS-HD MA
